Name: Neo Shock
About the game: Neo Shock is an FPS roguelike. You play as a cybernetic character with various tools, shoot, stealth attacks, hack, or just throw a box in your enemies' heads. The goal is to find the key and move to the next level while dealing with enemies the way you want. Tools Katana Pistol Shotgun Rifle Sniper Grenade Distraction Grenade Skills Bullet Time Mind Hack Invisibility Shield See Enemies through the walls
